sheets.description: Cover Sheet — Project data, governing codes, scope of work, sheet index, general notes
CalGreen Compliance Checklist page 1 — Environmental quality, recycling, occupant requirements
Site Plan — Existing & new site plan, setbacks, grading notes, utility connections
Floor Plan — ADU floor plan, plumbing fixture notes, fixture water use table
Sections & Elevations — Building sections, elevation views, roof plan, construction details
Structural Notes page 1 — Engineer: J. Gonzalez, Job No. 25109
Structural Plan — Framing plan, sheathing schedule, shear wall layout
Foundation Plan — Foundation details, footing sizes, reinforcement
Structural Details — DTC clip spacing, blocking details, connection details
Title 24 Energy — CF1R calculations, CHEERS/HERS provider
Title 24 Energy page 2 — Heat pump, HVAC, distribution

notes: Architectural sheets (CS, AIA, A-series) by C. Sanchez / Ideal ADU Design. Structural sheets (SN, S-series) by J. Gonzalez, Job No. 25109. Title 24 energy (T-series) dated 7/1/2025. Study Set watermark on cover sheet — 'Not For Construction / Prepped for City Submittal'.
